nodes.text: Clak'dor V was a location where the convicted human criminal Pretts Rulato served a 50 year sentence for manslaughter and industrial negligence. The sentence was listed on Rulato's profile, which was among a number of profiles seen on a New Republic database by Marshal Cara Dune when she surveyed for that of the convicted criminal Migs Mayfeld around 9 ABY.

Clak'dor V was mentioned on a screen in "Chapter 14: The Tragedy" of Jon Favreau's Disney+ series The Mandalorian, directed by Robert Rodriguez and released on December 4, 2020. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, the prison colony Clak'dor V was first mentioned in the 2004 Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game sourcebook Geonosis and the Outer Rim Worlds.
